text: Lagarde-Marc-la-Tour is a commune in the Corrèze department in central France. It was established on 1 January 2019 by merger of the former communes of Lagarde-Enval (the seat) and Marc-la-Tour.Arrêté préfectoral 6 December 2018 ==See also== *Communes of the Corrèze department ==References== Category:Communes of Corrèze Category:Populated places established in 2019
title: Lagarde-Marc-la-Tour
